text:
Transcend (https://transcend.io/product) | San Francisco, CA | Software Engineers | Full-time | Onsite

We’re hiring engineers that feel morally driven to work on an important product. We believe that turning the principles of data privacy into exercisable human rights is one of the most high-impact ways we can spend our time.

Transcend builds privacy infrastructure that helps consumers reclaim control of their data and companies comply with global data privacy laws. In the midst of new privacy regulations, we have the opportunity to define how modern privacy will work. Transcend will do everything in its power to bend the universe in that direction.

Our stack is Node, React, GraphQL, Terraform, and Postgres.

We’re backed by top-tier venture capital and we’re building out our core engineering team in SF.

Email me (cofounder/ceo) at ben+hn@transcend.io for more details.
